curriculum_standard: Based on National Postgraduate Entrance Examination Syllabus (English I & II)

topic_coverage.summary: Focus on data description (English II) and social cartoon commentary (English I).

categories.name: Category 1: English I - Cartoon Commentary (Social Phenomena)
example_prompts: Write an essay based on the cartoon: 'The Journey'

categories.name: Category 2: English II - Chart/Graph Description (Trends)
sub_topics: Lifestyle Changes (Mobile phone usage, Reading habits)
example_prompts: Describe the trends in 'College Students' Consumption'

categories.name: Category 3: Practical Writing (Letters/Notices)
example_prompts: Write a Letter Recommending a Book
Write a Notice for the Postgraduate Student Union

phrase_bank: as is vividly shown in the cartoon
the picture satirizes the phenomenon that
it is high time that we took measures

complex_structures: Subject Clauses (What is alarming is that...)
Inversion (Not only does it reflect..., but it also...)
Passive Voice in Data Description (It can be seen that...)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Formal and objective tone. Complex syntactical structures.

writing_standards.structure: English I: Describe Pic -> Interpret Meaning -> Comment/Suggestion. English II: Describe Chart -> Analyze Reasons -> Forecast.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Relevance, clear description, depth of analysis, language accuracy.
